org.jhotdraw.contrib
Class CommandCheckBoxMenuItem

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.AbstractButton
                  javax.swing.JMenuItem
                      javax.swing.JCheckBoxMenuItem
                          org.jhotdraw.contrib.CommandCheckBoxMenuItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, CommandHolder, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.ItemSelectable, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.MenuElement, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.SwingConstants
public class CommandCheckBoxMenuItem
extends javax.swing.JCheckBoxMenuItem
implements CommandHolder

CommandCheckBoxMenuItem implements a command that can be added to a menu as a checkbox menu item

Version:
<$CURRENT_VERSION$>
